venue.name: Center for Digital Imaging Arts at Boston University

item.description:
Join us for a presentation by Photography Big Shot: Walter Bibikow
Wednesday, November 17th, 2010 at 6:30pm

Join us on Wednesday, November 17th at 6:30 pm as our Big Shot series welcomes Walter Bibikow to talk about stock photography.

Cost:
Free

About Walter Bibikow:
He is a travel photographer based in Boston, MA, USA supplying destination imagery to many of the world’s leading stock photo agencies as well as directly licensing images to photo buyers worldwide.

He will share his love for travel for the past 30 years with a camera in tow. Travel editors see things differently from advertising art directors, and Walter will discuss the needs of his clients as he tries cover each location in several ways.

Good research is key in getting a good selection of images, so join as Walter Bibikow discusses his ventures as a travel stock photographer.

Check out Walter’s work at www.bibikow.com

Space is limited so RSVP to: events@cdiabu.com

group.name: Worcester Alliance of Photographers - AKA: WAP

item.name: Big Shots in Photography - Walter Bibikow
